channel.title: Good bots?
channel.description: I'm looking for some good bots and good places to bot. Basically I'm looking for botting advice and tips, I don't want to get my account v& and I want to make money. Its not for the sole purpose of money, I just want to advance my stats.

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:14, topic:414093”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=516058.msg3751897#msg3751897 date=1316109655]

Thats interesting, I remember hearing something about MechScape, but I don’t think it panned out. I probably won’t play it though.

MechScape was the assumed name for what is now StellarDawn
[/quote]

[quote author=StellarDawnFAQS] What happened to Mechscape?

Mechscape didn’t turn out to be the game we planned, so we cancelled the project. While Stellar Dawn is also based on a science fiction storyline, everything else was reinvented with the exception of some concept art. [/quote]
I don’t really like sci-fyi

But to bots, I’ve managed to get my fletching from 50-80, and mining a few levels. Tried rsbuddy but it was shit, didn’t work most of the time.[/quote]

Oops, my mistake I thought I had heard Mechscape was just the assumed name for what eventually turned out to be StellarDawn.

Read full topic

Mechscape didn’t turn out to be the game we planned, so we cancelled the project. While Stellar Dawn is also based on a science fiction storyline, everything else was reinvented with the exception of some concept art.[/quote]
I don’t really like sci-fyi

But to bots, I’ve managed to get my fletching from 50-80, and mining a few levels. Tried rsbuddy but it was shit, didn’t work most of the time.

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“yo123, post:2, topic:414109”]I’m sorry you’re a fucking retard who doesn’t realize all the paid bots are just resellers of the same shit and are inferior to free or cheaper alternatives that use the RSBuddy platform.

Furthermore, you say you want a skilling script but didn’t even include which skill you dumbshit. Wait I have the solution:

[code]
//credits to ruler fr making ibot!! u rock
//this is a claz wich has a scrpt that skills your skills
//start where u r going to skill your skills
public class a_skilling_script extends ColorScript implements AutoPaint {

public void script() throws InterruptedException {
    skillYourSkills();
}

public void onRepaint(Graphics g) throws InterruptedException {
    g.drawString("Your skills level is: " + getSkillsLevel(), 30, 30);
}

}
[/code][/quote]
cool story brah

Read full topic

item.title: Good bots?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

BloodRayne:

I’ve had friends that have botted for ages and they all seem to agree that the ban rate is going down on bots. I’m sure they don’t all use the same bot, so maybe Jagex is just getting really lazy or just doesn’t care anymore? It’s obvious that there is a bot problem, go to green dragons at any world. As for what bot to use, I’m not really sure. I just think the ban rate isn’t as high as it once was

I feel like bots are like the mexicans in the united states, they are the workers. I feel this way too, but let me repharse the question:
I am looking for good skilling bots.
Preferably free, but I will take cheap to expensive.
I want first hand accounts with the bot before I buy and it and its trustworthiness.
And of course, if someone has keys they would like to share, pm I’ll say no more.

Read full topic
